care_category_diagnosis.name: Most responsible
care_category_diagnosis.description: Most responsible diagnosis, must be only one per admission or visit

care_category_diagnosis.name: Associated
care_category_diagnosis.description: Associated diagnosis, can be several per admission or visit

care_category_diagnosis.name: Hospital acquired
care_category_diagnosis.description: Hospital acquired problem, can be several per admission or visit

care_category_diagnosis.name: Iatrogenic
care_category_diagnosis.description: Problem resulting from a procedural/surgical complication or medication mistake

care_category_procedure.name: Main
care_category_procedure.description: Main procedure, must be only one per op or intervention visit

care_category_procedure.name: Supplemental
care_category_procedure.description: Supplemental procedure, can be several per encounter op or intervention or visit

care_class_encounter.name: Inpatient
care_class_encounter.description: Inpatient admission - stays at least in a ward and assigned a bed

care_class_encounter.name: Outpatient
care_class_encounter.description: Outpatient visit - does not stay in a ward nor assigned a bed

care_class_financial.name: common
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with common health fund insurance policy.

care_class_financial.name: private + common
care_class_financial.description: Private services added to common services
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with common health fund insurance policy with additional private insurance policy OR self paying components.

care_class_financial.name: private
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with private insurance policy OR self paying.

care_class_financial.name: private plus
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with private health insurance policy AND self paying components.

care_class_financial.name: common
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with common health fund insurance policy.

care_class_financial.name: private + common
care_class_financial.description: Private services added to common services
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with common health fund insurance policy with additional private insurance policy OR self paying components.

care_class_financial.name: private
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with private insurance policy OR self paying.

care_class_financial.name: private plus
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with private health insurance policy AND self paying components.

care_class_financial.name: common
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with common health fund insurance policy.

care_class_financial.name: private + common
care_class_financial.description: Private services added to common clinician services
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with common health fund insurance policy with additional private insurance policy OR self paying components.

care_class_financial.name: private
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with private insurance policy OR self paying.

care_class_financial.name: private plus
care_class_financial.policy: Patient with private health insurance policy AND self paying components.

care_class_insurance.name: Private
care_class_insurance.description: Private insurance plan (paid by insured alone)

care_class_insurance.name: Health Fund
care_class_insurance.description: Public (common) health fund - usually paid both by the insured and his employer, eventually paid by the state

care_department.description: Ear-Nose-Throath, in german Hals-Nasen-Ohren. The department with very old traditions that date back to the early beginnings of premodern medicine.

care_department.description: Physical therapy department with on-call therapists. Day care clinics, training, rehab.

care_effective_day.name: entire stay
care_effective_day.description: effective starting from admission date & ending on discharge date

care_type_discharge.name: Patient left hospital on his own will

care_type_encounter.name: Birth delivery
care_type_encounter.description: Admission or visit for birth delivery

care_type_insurance.name: Extra medical insurance
care_type_insurance.description: Extra medical insurance (evt. pays extra services)

care_type_insurance.name: Dental insurance
care_type_insurance.description: Separate dental plan in case not included in medical plan or simply additional private plan

care_type_insurance.name: Disability plan
care_type_insurance.description: Disability insurance plan - general , both long term & short term

care_type_insurance.name: Retirement income plan (general)
care_type_insurance.description: Retirement income plan - either private or income/employer supported

care_type_insurance.name: Educational Reimbursement Plan
care_type_insurance.description: Reimbursement plan for education, either private or employer supported

care_type_insurance.name: Retirement medical plan
care_type_insurance.description: Medical plan in retirement - might include other care services

care_type_insurance.name: Liability Insurance Plan
care_type_insurance.description: General liability insurance - either private or employer supported

care_type_insurance.name: Unemployment Insurance Plan
care_type_insurance.description: Unemployment insurance , in case compulsory unemployment funds are guaranteed by the state, this plan is usually privately paid by the insured

care_type_test.name: Radiological Lab
care_type_test.description: Lab for X-ray, Mammography, Computer Tomography, NMR

care_type_time.name: Patient entry/exit
care_type_time.description: Times when patient entered and left the op room

care_type_time.name: OP start/end
care_type_time.description: Times when op started (1st incision) and ended (last suture)

care_type_time.name: Delay time
care_type_time.description: Times when the op was delayed due to any reason

care_type_time.name: Plaster cast
care_type_time.description: Times when the plaster cast was made

care_type_time.name: Reposition
care_type_time.description: Times when a dislocated joint(s) was repositioned (non invasive op)

care_type_time.name: Coronary catheter
care_type_time.description: Times when a coronary catherer op was done (minimal invasive op)

care_type_time.name: Bandage
care_type_time.description: Times when the bandage was made
